column4: I have a problem with my panels on xfce4 ... i can open it with the termial but as soon as i close the termal the panel stops running again..
and no idea what the settings file name is to delete and see that will fixed it
just have to try a few
i had a hard time.. but i tried different software and that worked out great
Yes.  I'm currently using TwinView right now.  The wallpaper stretched out.
having problem getting it change to separate x
are you wanting to run daul monitoring or something else..
Yes.  Well, I'm currently running dual-monitor right now.  It's fine.
What is it that you're trying to help me with?
thought you were having problem getting the the other types because twin-view to work

No.  I had it running (recently).  However, because I'm using laptop.  So I recently enabled on the dual-monitor to external monitor.  I'm trying to figure out if I'd want a TwinView or Separate X Session.
I'll try it.  Thanks.  (And you too! lstarnes).
